article.title: Status and history for afr
article.para: The document contains ho’r and materi’le. Should these be hoër and materiële?

history.history-entry: [Eric Muller] created some notes, to document the representation of ’n; replaced the occurrences of U+0149 by <2019, 006E>, as well as the occurrences of U+2018 by <2019>.
[Eric Muller] replaced the occurrences of <', n> by U+0149 ŉ LATIN SMALL LETTER N PRECEDED BY APOSTROPHE (according the CLDR 1.4 examplar character set).
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
